item.title: DAMAC introduces Maison Cour Jardin in the heart of downtown Dubai
item.description:
At the end of December 2014, DAMAC Properties, a high-end real estate developer, launched its third luxury serviced apartment complex in Dubai’s Burj Area. Located just a short distance from popular attractions like the Dubai Mall and Dubai Fountain, DAMAC Maison Cour Jardin joins the company’s growing portfolio, which includes DAMAC Maison Dubai Mall Street and DAMAC Maison Canal Views. Source: DAMAC Properties. “DAMAC Properties is expanding its hospitality offerings, both in terms of scale and quality, to cater to Dubai’s visitors,” stated Niall McLoughlin, Senior Vice President of DAMAC Properties...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/damac-introduces-maison-cour-jardin-in-the-heart-of-downtown-dubai/

item.title: DAMAC Properties has revealed plans for three new serviced hotels in Dubai
item.description:
High-end real estate company DAMAC Properties is expanding its presence in the hospitality sector with the addition of three new serviced hotels in Dubai’s Burj Area. Two of these hotels, Cour Jardin and Capital Bay, are scheduled to open within the next few months, while Canal Views is already operational and receiving guests. This initiative is part of DAMAC Properties’ goal to become the leading provider of serviced hotel apartments in the Middle East by 2018...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/damac-properties-has-revealed-plans-for-three-new-serviced-hotels-in-dubai/
